title: Chat Rooms
description: Chatrooms is a Node.js-based web application designed to facilitate both audio and text-based chat rooms. The application leverages PeerJS to establish a Peer-to-Peer network, incorporating WebRTC for real-time communication and handling NAT traversal challenges. Additionally, a TURN (Traversal Using Relays around NAT) and STUN (Session Traversal Utilities for NAT) server are employed to ensure seamless communication.
